A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As an avid fan of star wars 1-7\, this is by far the worst.  They introduced new characters to achieve a racial diversity quota that don't further the story\, but instead hampers it.  rey\, Poe and finn are void of character development.  And Luke Skywalker was reduced to a grumpy coward for no good reason.  I repeat\, No good reason. ANd this is only scratching the surface of the problems This is the first star wars movie I have seen in theatres without repeat viewings.  Very disappointed.  This trilogy should have been entirely JJ Abrams.
